languages.text: "Куда важнее решить, что делать с тассерцием. Мы не можем проигнорировать подобный... ресурс". {n}Соломон смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Мое предложение — уничтожить весь добытый тассерций и его залежи. Шансы, что сам материал является источником порчи, слишком высоки. Требуются годы исследований Адептус Астра Телепатика, чтобы удостовериться, что он безопасен для душ санкционатов — годы, которых нет у Коронуса, даже если у местного Адепта были бы ресурсы на это. Против Лекса позволять существовать подобной мерзости. Что касается оценки осквернения Тассеры и ее участи, закон предписывает оставить это на суд владельца мира — Администратума".

traits.locale_text: "Остается главный вопрос — десятина. Судя по документам, частота поставки — каждое терранское десятилетие. Установленная норма — тысяча грузовых единиц тассерция. И какая-то часть может быть варп-активна, если Руолдо не соврал нам".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Куда важнее решить, что делать с тассерцием. Мы не можем проигнорировать подобный... ресурс". {n}Соломон смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Мое предложение — уничтожить весь добытый тассерций и его залежи. Шансы, что сам материал является источником порчи, слишком высоки. Требуются годы исследований Адептус Астра Телепатика, чтобы удостовериться, что он безопасен для душ санкционатов — годы, которых нет у Коронуса, даже если у местного Адепта были бы ресурсы на это. Против Лекса позволять существовать подобной мерзости. Что касается оценки осквернения Тассеры и ее участи, закон предписывает оставить это на суд владельца мира — Администратума".

languages.text: “我们得决定如何处理这些塔瑟拉水晶，这个问题重要得多。这种资源……绝对不能坐视不管。”{n}索罗蒙直视着你的眼睛。{/n}“我建议销毁所有已经开采的塔瑟拉水晶，将矿床彻底摧毁。这些水晶极有可能就是腐化的根源。如果想要证明这种水晶不会对合法灵能者的灵魂构成威胁，星语庭恐怕要花上许多年的时间进行研究。就算真的有足够的研究资金，科罗努斯扩区也等不了那么久。若是允许这种邪恶的水晶继续存在下去，等同于违背帝国律法。至于该如何评估塔瑟拉的腐化程度，如何决定它的命运，根据法律规定，相关权力属于这个世界的主人，也就是内政部。”
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

languages.text: 「タッセリウムをどう扱うかを決めることの方が、はるかに重要です。これは…無視できない資源ですから」{n}ソロモーンはあなたの目をじっと見つめた。{/n}「すでに採掘されたタッセリウムも、まだ埋蔵されているものもすべて破壊することを提案します。あのような異端の存在を放置することは、レックスに反します。タッセーラの汚染の程度を評価し、その運命を決める件については、その惑星の所有者、すなわち帝国行政局の判断に委ねると法に定められています」
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセリウムをどう扱うかを決めることの方が、はるかに重要です。これは…無視できない資源ですから」{n}ソロモーンはあなたの目をじっと見つめた。{/n}「すでに採掘されたタッセリウムも、まだ埋蔵されているものもすべて破壊することを提案します。あのような異端の存在を放置することは、レックスに反します。タッセーラの汚染の程度を評価し、その運命を決める件については、その惑星の所有者、すなわち帝国行政局の判断に委ねると法に定められています」

languages.text: «Es mucho más importante decidir qué hacer con el thassertio. Se trata de un... recurso que no podemos permitirnos el lujo de ignorar». {n}Solomorne te mira directamente a los ojos.{/n} «Propongo destruir todo el thassertio que se ha excavado, junto con sus depósitos. La probabilidad de que el propio material sea una fuente de corrupción es demasiado elevada. El Adeptus Astra Telepathica tendría que investigar durante años para demostrar que es apto para su uso por los autorizados, y son años que Koronus no tendría aunque el Adeptus local tuviera los fondos necesarios. Permitir la existencia de semejante abominación vulnera la Lex. En lo relativo a evaluar el grado de corrupción de Thassera a fin de decidir su destino, la ley dicta que lo dejemos en manos de los dueños del planeta; en este caso, el Administratum».
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

La probabilidad de que el propio material sea una fuente de corrupción es demasiado elevada. El Adeptus Astra Telepathica tendría que investigar durante años para demostrar que es apto para su uso por los autorizados, y son años que Koronus no tendría aunque el Adeptus local tuviera los fondos necesarios. Permitir la existencia de semejante abominación vulnera la Lex. En lo relativo a evaluar el grado de corrupción de Thassera a fin de decidir su destino, la ley dicta que lo dejemos en manos de los dueños del planeta; en este caso, el Administratum».

languages.text: "Tasertiyuma ne olacağına karar vermek çok daha önemli. Bu, görmezden gelemeyeceğimiz bir kaynak." {n}Solomorne, gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Hâlihazırda çıkarılmış tüm tasertiyumun yanı sıra yataklarının da yok edilmesini öneriyorum. Kaynağın bizzat yozlaşmaya neden olma olasılığı çok yüksek. Adeptus Astra Telepathica'nın, onaylıların ruhları için güvenli olduğunu kanıtlaması bile yıllarca araştırma yapılmasını gerektirir. Koronus'ta buna finansman ayrılabilse bile bu kadar zamanımız yok. Böyle bir iğrençliğin var olmasına izin vermek, Lex'e aykırıdır. Thassera'nın yozlaşma derecesini değerlendirmeye ve kaderine karar vermeye gelince... Kanunlar bunu dünyanın sahibinin, yani Administratum'un takdirine bırakmayı öngörür."
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Tasertiyuma ne olacağına karar vermek çok daha önemli. Bu, görmezden gelemeyeceğimiz bir kaynak." {n}Solomorne, gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Hâlihazırda çıkarılmış tüm tasertiyumun yanı sıra yataklarının da yok edilmesini öneriyorum. Kaynağın bizzat yozlaşmaya neden olma olasılığı çok yüksek. Adeptus Astra Telepathica'nın, onaylıların ruhları için güvenli olduğunu kanıtlaması bile yıllarca araştırma yapılmasını gerektirir. Koronus'ta buna finansman ayrılabilse bile bu kadar zamanımız yok. Böyle bir iğrençliğin var olmasına izin vermek, Lex'e aykırıdır. Thassera'nın yozlaşma derecesini değerlendirmeye ve kaderine karar vermeye gelince... Kanunlar bunu dünyanın sahibinin, yani Administratum'un takdirine bırakmayı öngörür."

languages.text: « Le plus important reste de décider de ce que nous allons faire du thassertium. C'est une... ressource que nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'ignorer. » {n}Solomorne vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Je propose de détruire tout le thassertium déjà miné, au même titre que ses dépôts. La probabilité que le matériau constitue en lui-même une source de corruption est trop élevée. Il faudrait à l'Adeptus Astra Telepathica des années de recherches pour confirmer l'absence de risques pour l'âme des assermentés ; des années dont Koronus ne dispose pas, même si l'Adepte local détenait les fonds nécessaires. L'existence même de cette abomination va à l'encontre de la Lex. Quant à déterminer le degré de corruption de Thassera et décider de son sort, la loi impose de laisser ce jugement aux propriétaires du monde concerné... autrement dit, l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « Le plus important reste de décider de ce que nous allons faire du thassertium. C'est une... ressource que nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'ignorer. » {n}Solomorne vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Je propose de détruire tout le thassertium déjà miné, au même titre que ses dépôts. La probabilité que le matériau constitue en lui-même une source de corruption est trop élevée. Il faudrait à l'Adeptus Astra Telepathica des années de recherches pour confirmer l'absence de risques pour l'âme des assermentés ; des années dont Koronus ne dispose pas, même si l'Adepte local détenait les fonds nécessaires. L'existence même de cette abomination va à l'encontre de la Lex. Quant à déterminer le degré de corruption de Thassera et décider de son sort, la loi impose de laisser ce jugement aux propriétaires du monde concerné... autrement dit, l'Administratum. »

languages.text: "Die Entscheidung, was mit dem Thassertim geschehen soll, ist weit wichtiger. Es ist eine ... Ressource, die wir nicht ignorieren können." {n}Solomorne blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich schlage vor, das gesamte bereits abgebaute Thassertim und sämtliche Lager zu zerstören. Zu hoch ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass das Material selbst eine Quelle der Verderbnis ist. Das Adeptus Astra Telepathica müsste jahrelang forschen, um zu beweisen, dass es für die Seelen der Sanktionierten sicher ist. Jahre, die Koronus nicht hat, selbst, wenn der örtliche Adept Mittel bereitstellen könnte. Die Existenz einer solchen Abscheulichkeit zuzulassen, verstößt gegen das Lex. Die Beurteilung des Verderbnisgrades von Thassera und die Entscheidung über sein Schicksal obliegt gemäß Gesetz den Eigentümern der Welt ... in diesem Fall dem Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Deciding what to do with the thassertium is far more important. It is a... resource we cannot afford to ignore." {n}Solomorne looks you straight in the eye.{/n} "I propose destroying all the thassertium already mined, as well as its deposits. The probability that the material itself is a source of corruption is too high. It would take years of research by the Adeptus Astra Telepathica to prove it safe for the souls of the sanctioned, years that Koronus does not have even if the local Adept had funds to spare. Allowing an abomination like that to exist is against the Lex. As for assessing the degree of Thassera's corruption and deciding its fate, the law prescribes leaving this to the judgement of the world's owners — that is, the Administratum."

Ressource, die wir nicht ignorieren können." {n}Solomorne blickt dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich schlage vor, das gesamte bereits abgebaute Thassertim und sämtliche Lager zu zerstören. Zu hoch ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass das Material selbst eine Quelle der Verderbnis ist. Das Adeptus Astra Telepathica müsste jahrelang forschen, um zu beweisen, dass es für die Seelen der Sanktionierten sicher ist. Jahre, die Koronus nicht hat, selbst, wenn der örtliche Adept Mittel bereitstellen könnte. Die Existenz einer solchen Abscheulichkeit zuzulassen, verstößt gegen das Lex. Die Beurteilung des Verderbnisgrades von Thassera und die Entscheidung über sein Schicksal obliegt gemäß Gesetz den Eigentümern der Welt ... in diesem Fall dem Administratum."
